stat_1.content: 99.9999999% of an atom is empty space

stat_2.content: Humans share 60% of their DNA with bananas

stat_3.content: Sharks have existed for over 400 million years

stat_4.content: 90% of the cells in your body are not human, but bacteria

stat_5.content: A human sneeze travels up to 160 km/h
